attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the goverment to increase the current rate of carers allowence from the minimum rate ,to a minimum rate of £95 ,medium rate of £135 ,  and a maximum rate of £195 without loosing any other benefits ,ie rent,rates ,or income support ,and that pension ers should be paid  the medium rate without loosing pension rates
